text: Yaboola mbu; â€œEnywe Abandu banje mulola murie nendi nende eshimanyisio shirula khu Nyasaye wanje ne yangabile omukabo omulayi, okhurula khuye, ne esie shindenya okhukabukhana ninanyu akebakaninjia tawe, shindenya halali okhukasia shingala enyalilwa ne okhubura khwanje shikhwakhaba tawe halali khu bunyali bwa Nyasaye, niye wandisichile na ewuwe niwenjomele
